name: Procedurally Generated Ice Slide Puzzle Prototype
name_original: Procedurally Generated Ice Slide Puzzle Prototype
description:
Slide through procedurally generated ice block puzzles to get to the other side. Diagonal movement is supported. Use the arrow keys to move. Exiting at the top of the zone resets the puzzle. How many times can you make it across the ice?

Due to real world obligations, I had to leave this game jam entry in prototype form. I used my WIP "demake" framework as the base and built out procedural ice slide puzzles. This quick prototype demonstrates how a singular top-down mechanic could be formatted into a standalone game.
